title: Full closure of train services on Bukit Panjang LRT

title_translations.zh-Hans: Bukit Panjang LRT 列车服务全面关闭
title_translations.ms: Penutupan penuh perkhidmatan kereta api di Bukit Panjang LRT
title_translations.ta: Bukit Panjang LRT இல் ரயில் சேவைகள் முழுமையாக மூடப்பட்டுள்ளன

updates.text:
📢FYI: There will be full closure of train services on BPLRT on 1 Oct (Sun) to support renewal works for the Operations Control Centre (OCC). 

🚍See poster below for info on first/last bus timings.

👀See @LTAsg 's X and media release for full details: https://t.co/zTqMVTfu41 https://t.co/qZorhxzCoe
